trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ColumnDividerDoubleClick"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A> property using the `columnIndex` value.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor inicializa o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>propriedade usando o `columnIndex` valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnDividerDoubleClickEventArgs.ColumnIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The values of properties inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs> are initialized to the values specified in `e`.
trans-unit.target: Os valores das propriedades herdadas de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs>são inicializadas com os valores especificados no `e`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The index of the column next to the column divider that was double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna ao lado do divisor de coluna que foi clicado duas vezes.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs"></xref> containing the inherited event data.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HandledMouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de eventos herdados.

trans-unit.source: The index of the column next to the column divider that was double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna ao lado do divisor de coluna que foi clicado duas vezes.

trans-unit.source: This method indicates the column to the left of the double-clicked divider if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>; otherwise, it indicates the column to the right of the double-clicked divider.
trans-unit.target: Este método indica que a coluna à esquerda do divisor usuário clica duas vezes se a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>tem um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>valor da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>; caso contrário, ele indica que a coluna à direita do divisor usuário clica duas vezes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: The index is the zero-based index of the column in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice é o índice com base em zero da coluna no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName>coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The index of the column next to the divider.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coluna ao lado do divisor.
